Name: Scars of Summer
About the game: Keita lives in a quiet countryside town. His childhood friend, Ryoka Enomoto, is a women's basketball ace for her university. Due to family circumstances, he needs a place to live for the summer, so he gets invited to stay at his friend Ryoka's house. Spend the summer exploring the area, meeting new people, and learning more about Ryoka in this slice of life RPG. Features: A Slice of Life RPG Contemporary Japanese Setting Explore a Japanese Countryside Town Calendar System with a Time Limit Get to Know Ryoka
